text: This is a list of New Zealand first-class cricket records; that is, record team and individual performances in first-class cricket for Auckland, Canterbury, Central Districts, Northern Districts, Otago, and Wellington, teams representing New Zealand (at various levels), both in New Zealand and overseas, and other first-class teams in New Zealand. ==Team records== ===Highest innings total=== *777 Canterbury v Otago at Christchurch 1996/97 *752-8d New South Wales v Otago at Dunedin 1923/24 *726 Northern Districts v Canterbury at Rangiora 2009/10 *693-9d Auckland v Canterbury at
